Description: Contains employee information such as employee ID, name, job, manager ID, hire date, and salary.
Stores department information including department ID, name, and manager ID.
Holds location details such as location ID, street address, postal code, city, state, and country.
Contains country information such as country ID and country name.
Stores region information including region ID and region name.
Holds job information such as job ID, job title, minimum salary, and maximum salary.
Stores historical job data including employee ID, start date, end date, job ID, and department ID.
